actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend title I of the Housing Act of 1949 to permit a city whose population falls to below 50,000 to convert any outstanding urban renewal projects from a two-thirds to a three-fourths capital grant formula.

summary.text: Provides under the Housing Act of 1949 that a city whose population falls to below fifty thousand to convert any outstanding urban renewal projects from a two-thirds to a three-fourths capital grant formula.

titles.title: A bill to amend title I of the Housing Act of 1949 to permit a city whose population falls to below 50,000 to convert any outstanding urban renewal projects from a two-thirds to a three-fourths capital grant formula.
